channel.title: Clawscape [recruiting]
channel.description:
Hey everyone. i have a server and i mostly need coders and a hoster that can host it 24/7 or close to thier Note to mods: I'm not advertising, but trying to get some good helpers with making a good server, and trying to get new people that attempt to help code to learn a bit more.
All I need are some coders, AND A 24/7(close to it) HOSTER
Coders Me barrage u - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Hoster -
Goals: get the silab items working get a client for the server Anything else you people come up with
Job wanted: if a chosen as coder xp: Proof: If hoster, trustworthy?: If hoster, Keep server on AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE?: Active on forums/in game?:
